description:
I had a working stack using Centos 7.2 on mitaka version.

The nova version that I have is openstack-nova-compute-13.1.0-1.el7.noarch.rpm

Not sure if it's related but I started to have this problem after configuring ceilometer and aodh.


2016-07-05 07:09:29.434 75945 WARNING oslo_reports.guru_meditation_report [-] Guru mediation now registers SIGUSR1 and SIGUSR2 by default for backward compatibility. SIGUSR1 will no longer be registered in a future release, so please use SIGUSR2 to generate reports.
2016-07-05 07:09:29.505 75945 INFO oslo_service.periodic_task [-] Skipping periodic task _periodic_update_dns because its interval is negative
2016-07-05 07:09:29.510 75945 INFO nova.virt.driver [-] Loading compute driver 'libvirt.LibvirtDriver'
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 CRITICAL nova [-] ValueError: invalid limits: cpu_time
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova Traceback (most recent call last):
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/bin/nova-compute", line 10, in <module>
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     sys.exit(main())
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/cmd/compute.py", line 74, in main
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     db_allowed=CONF.conductor.use_local)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 296, in create
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     db_allowed=db_allowed)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/service.py", line 182, in __init__
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     self.manager = manager_class(host=self.host, *args, **kwargs)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 727, in __init__
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     self.driver = driver.load_compute_driver(self.virtapi, compute_driver)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/driver.py", line 1622, in load_compute_driver
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     virtapi)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_utils/importutils.py", line 62, in import_object_ns
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     cls = import_class(import_value)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_utils/importutils.py", line 30, in import_class
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     __import__(mod_str)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/__init__.py", line 15, in <module>
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     from nova.virt.libvirt import driver
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 90, in <module>
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     from nova.virt.disk import api as disk
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/disk/api.py", line 46, in <module>
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     from nova.virt import images
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/images.py", line 43, in <module>
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     address_space=1 * units.Gi)
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova   File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_concurrency/processutils.py", line 149, in __init__
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova     % ', '.join(sorted(kw.keys())))
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova ValueError: invalid limits: cpu_time
2016-07-05 07:09:29.539 75945 ERROR nova
title: Nova compute won't start

comments.content:
I had a working stack using Centos 7.2 on mitaka version.

The nova version that I have is openstack-nova-compute-13.1.0-1.el7.noarch.rpm

Not sure if it's related but I started to have this problem after configuring ceilometer and aodh.

comments.content:
I hit this problem as well, and the root cause was a version incompatibility between python2-oslo-concurrency-3.6.0-1.el7.noarch and openstack-nova-compute.noarch 1:13.1.0-1.el7. 

Updating the oslo_concurrency package to python2-oslo-concurrency-3.7.1-1.el7.noarch fixed the issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~donoftime00
